subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The 76ers, the Timberwolves and the Knicks have managed only five wins each, spurring talk that one might break the N.B.A.’s futility mark, 9-73 by the 1972-73 Sixers.
snippet: The 76ers, the Timberwolves and the Knicks have managed only five wins each, spurring talk that one might break the N.B.A.’s futility mark, 9-73 by the 1972-73 Sixers.
